Content Marketing Survey 2015

Content marketing has established itself as a mainstream marketing tactic in Australia and New Zealand. Over the past 12 months, we’ve seen a significant shift in the mindsets of marketing professionals, with content marketing no longer an add-on, but the main driver of organic search traffic, social engagement, brand building and lead generation.

Our Content Marketing Survey 2015 / 16 canvassed the opinions and experiences of marketing professionals and decision makers in Australia and New Zealand. A summary of the results is available on our Content Marketing Blog. You can download the full report using the link below.
